JobFullDesc: At Uber, we ignite opportunity by setting the world in motion. We take on big problems to help drivers, riders, delivery partners, and eaters get moving in more than 10,000 cities around the world. We are looking for a software engineer on the Unified Testing Platform (UTP) team. With several thousands of micro-services implemented with various technologies, Uber is investing in disruptive approaches to tackle integration testing across services. We need senior engineers bringing creativity onto the table, able to digest complex and evolving requirements from all our engineering teams, comfortable in a fast-paced environment, and with a mindset focused on impact. Your role is to build foundations for thousands of developers and testers at Uber, and improve the ability to ship software reliably. As a senior engineer on the team, you will have a direct impact on improving the testing infrastructure at Uber.  This is a unique opportunity for an experienced engineer who is collaborative, has a healthy sense of curiosity and acts with responsibility to join Uber, work with talented people across the board and help improve our next-generation infrastructure systems by scaling it to the next level.
